definitions.definition: A temporary projection of the cytoplasm of certain cells , such as phagocytes , or of certain unicellular organisms , such as amoebas , that serves in locomotion .
A projection acting as a foot in certain insect larvae .
An extension or projection from something.

main_definition: ( cytology ) A temporary projection of the cytoplasm of certain cells , such as phagocytes , or of certain unicellular organisms , such as amoebas , that serves in locomotion . [from 19th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) A projection acting as a foot in certain insect larvae . [from 19th c.]
( by extension ) An extension or projection from something. [from 20th c.]
